TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract ShaderEffect extends System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect
Public MustInherit Class ShaderEffect Inherits Effect
public ref class ShaderEffect abstract : System::Windows::Media::Effects::Effect

summary.span: 使用 ，提供自訂點陣圖效果。

span.span: Provides a custom bitmap effect by using a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自類別來實作自訂效果根據單一像素著色器。Derive from the class to implement a custom effect based on a single pixel shader. 下列步驟示範如何建立自訂效果。The following steps show how to create a custom effect. 1. 負載從先行編譯的高階著色語言 (HLSL) 位元組程式碼。Load a from precompiled High Level Shading Language (HLSL) bytecode. 2. 定義代表之參數的效果的相依性屬性和-基礎介面的輸入。Define dependency properties that represent the parameters of the effect and the -based surface inputs. 使用其中一種將使用這些輸入的多載 HLSL 位元組程式碼中註冊所參考的數字。Use one of the overloads to associate these inputs with register numbers that are referenced in the HLSL bytecode. 取樣器的數目是限制為 4。The number of samplers is limited to 4. 使用 PS 3.0 著色器時，就會適用下列限制。The following restrictions apply when using a PS 3.0 shader. - PS 3.0 著色器指派時，取樣器的數目會增加為 8。When a PS 3.0 shader is assigned, the number of samplers increases to 8. 指派其他的著色器，以啟用註冊 8 取樣器之前的 PS 3.0 著色器。Assign the PS 3.0 shader before other shaders to enable registering 8 samplers. - 完整的著色器常數暫存器的浮點數的 224 會使用的限制。The full shader constant register limit of 224 for floats is used. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ps_3_0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=166292)。For more information, see [ps_3_0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=166292). - PS 3.0 著色器只會支援下列資料類型。The following data types are supported in PS 3.0 shaders only. 如果這些使用較低的著色器版本，則會擲回例外狀況。An exception is thrown if these are used in lower shader versions. - `int` 和型別可轉換為`int`: `uint`， `byte`， `sbyte`， `long`， `ulong`， `short`， `ushort`， `char``int` and types convertible to `int`: `uint`, `byte`, `sbyte`, `long`, `ulong`, `short`, `ushort`, `char` - `bool` - 如果在沒有硬體支援 PS 3.0 的電腦上載入有效的 PS 3.0 著色器，則會忽略著色器。If a valid PS 3.0 shader is loaded on a computer that does not have hardware support for PS 3.0, the shader is ignored. 如果著色器無效，則會擲不回任何例外狀況。If the shader is invalid, no exception is thrown. - 如果電腦有一個以上的視訊卡，行為會定義由至少具備的視訊卡。If a computer has more than one video card, the behavior is defined by the least capable video card. 比方說，如果電腦有兩個視訊卡，其中支援 PS 3.0，但其中並不會行為是相同，如果電腦不支援 PS 3.0。For example, if the computer has two video cards, one of which supports PS 3.0 and one of which does not, the behavior is the same as if the computer does not support PS 3.0. - 如果電腦有支援轉譯 PS 3.0 在硬體中，但指派無效的 PS 3.0 著色器，就會引發事件。If a computer supports rendering PS 3.0 in hardware, but an invalid PS 3.0 shader is assigned, the event is raised. 無效的 PS 3.0 著色器的範例是以編譯`ps_3_sw`旗標。An example of an invalid PS 3.0 shader is one compiled with the `ps_3_sw` flag. 類別接受編譯的 PS 3.0 著色器`ps_3_0`旗標傳遞至 fxc.exe。The class accepts only PS 3.0 shaders that are compiled with the `ps_3_0` flag passed to fxc.exe. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 效果編譯器工具](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=166293)。For more information, see [Effect-Compiler Tool](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=166293). > [!NOTE] > PS 2.0 著色器所執行的軟體中轉譯時。PS 2.0 shaders run when rendering in software. 不過，即使系統的硬體支援 PS 3.0，PS 3.0 著色器無法執行期間的軟體呈現。However, even if PS 3.0 is supported by the system's hardware, PS 3.0 shaders do not run during software rendering. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生自類別。The following code example shows how to derive from the class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect/CS/ThresholdEffect.cs#1)] 下列程式碼範例顯示對應至先前的著色器類別。The following code example shows a shader that corresponds to the previous class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect/CS/Threshold.fx#10)] 下列 XAML 示範如何使用自訂著色器效果。The following XAML shows how to use the custom shader effect. [!code-xaml[System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect#1000](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect/CS/Window1.xaml#1000)]

summary.span: 當複製這個物件的相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能已不能再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

span.span: When copying this object's dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (which may no longer resolve), but not animations or their current values.

span.span: A modifiable clone of this instance.

span.span: The returned clone is effectively a deep copy of the current object.
The clone's property is .

MemberSignature.Value: protected: property int DdxUvDdyUvRegisterIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.DdxUvDdyUvRegisterIndex : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示相對於螢幕空間之紋理座標的部分衍生項目所使用的著色器暫存器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the shader register to use for the partial derivatives of the texture coordinates with respect to screen space.

value.span: 包含部分衍生項目之暫存器的索引。

span.span: The index of the register that contains the partial derivatives.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用座標相對於螢幕空間的屬性，以指定包含部分衍生項目紋理的著色器暫存器。Use the property to specify the shader register that contains the partial derivatives of the texture coordinates with respect to screen space. 例如，如果設為 4，使用著色器暫存器 c4。For example, if is set to 4, the shader register c4 is used. 註冊 c4 包含四個浮點數的欄位。Register c4 contains four float fields. 下列的高階著色語言 (HLSL) 程式碼會示範如何使用這個暫存器。The following High Level Shading Language (HLSL) code shows how this register is used. `nextPixelUV`值表示下一個像素右。The `nextPixelUV` value represents the next pixel to the right. ``` float4 ddxUvDdyUv : register(c4); SamplerState sampler : register(S0); ... float2 nextPixelUV; nextPixelUV.u = ddxUvDdyUv.x + u; nextPixelUV.v = ddxUvDdyUv.y + v; tex2D(sampler, nextPixelUV); ``` 下表顯示如何註冊指定填滿。The following table shows how the register specified for is filled. |註冊常數Register Constant|衍生的值Derivative Value| |-----------------------|----------------------| |x 元件x component|ddx （u)ddx(u)| |y 元件y component|ddx(v)ddx(v)| |z 元件z component|ddyddy(u)| |w 分量w component|ddy(v)ddy(v)| 材質座標會表示為`(u, v)`。Texture coordinates are denoted as `(u, v)`. `ddx(u)` 是的紋理座標元件常數的部分衍生項目`u`相對於螢幕空間 x 座標。`ddx(u)` is the constant partial derivative of the texture coordinate component `u` with respect to the screen-space x-coordinate. `ddy(u)` 是紋理座標的部分衍生項目`u`相對於螢幕空間 y 座標。`ddy(u)` is the partial derivative of the texture coordinate `u` with respect to the screen-space y-coordinate. 同樣地，`ddx(v)`並`ddy(v)`是紋理座標元件對應的螢幕空間衍生項目`v`。Similarly, `ddx(v)` and `ddy(v)` are the corresponding screen-space derivatives for the texture coordinate component `v`. > [!NOTE] > HLSL 的 ddx 和 ddy 的指示，可讓計算這些值，但這些指示不適用於所有 PixelShader 2.0 硬體。HLSL has the ddx and ddy instructions to calculate these values, but these instructions are not available on all PixelShader 2.0 hardware. 您可能會以下列方式將這些常數。You may think of these constants in the following way. 如果您逐步執行 1 個像素至右側螢幕空間 （以 x 方向），然後`ddx(u)`是數量，`u`材質空間中的變更並`ddx(v)`是數量，`v`材質空間中的變更。If you step 1 pixel to the right in screen space (in the x direction), then `ddx(u)` is the amount that `u` changes in texture space, and `ddx(v)` is the amount that `v` changes in texture space. 如果效果是軸對齊呈現時，然後`ddx(v)`為 0。If the effect is axis-aligned when it is rendered, then `ddx(v)` is 0. 是否要在呈現時，然後，旋轉效果`ddx(v)`為非零。If the effect is rotated when it is rendered, then `ddx(v)` is non-zero.

exception.span: 當嘗試設定 屬性超過一次以上，或是在一開始處理效果之後。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，當您註冊的著色器常數的相依性屬性。Use the method when you register a dependency property for a shader constant. 方法建構委派，叫用時，會建立相依性屬性與所指定的著色器常數暫存器之間的關聯`floatRegisterIndex`。The method constructs a delegate that, when invoked, creates an association between the dependency property and the shader constant register specified by `floatRegisterIndex`.
